JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Senior Project Planner for Offshore Wind Projects, DK - Esbjerg, DK - Copenhagen, DK - Aalborg, PL - Gdynia
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you want to take your career to the next level in the dynamic energy industry?
Then look no further! Get your career off to a flying start as our Renewables Division is looking for an experienced candidate to fill the position as Senior Project Planner.

Your position
As our new Senior Project Planner, you will be involved in major projects throughout Europe, Asia and the USA. You will report to the Head of Planning and have a Planning team to turn to just as you’ll be working in close collaboration with the project managers and across teams in the Renewables Division.

“Semco is a major player in the offshore wind industry and currently growing in success and reputation towards global clients. Planning is a key element in all projects. It is challenging, ever changing and enables a broad scope of knowledge to be gained in tendering, project management, engineering, procurement & construction.”
Flemming Breum, Senior Director, EPC Management.

Your tasks & responsibilities
The successful candidate will be expected to take over the lead planner on some of Renewables Division’s largest projects.

Your tasks and responsibilities will include but are not limited to:

  • Supporting management with project time management, assuring that projects are executed on time and key deadlines are met.
  • Maintain pro-active communication with other planners and management teams of vendors, consortium partners and clients to ensure that project programme is aligned continuously with all project stakeholders.
  • Following up on internal progress from engineering and construction teams and setting up and running internal reporting towards Project Management and company’s Steering Committee, in accordance with internal standard guidelines Maintain the project programme in Primavera P6, updating progress, maintaining baselines, running analysis on possible scenarios of project execution and issuing monthly progress reports with accurate and valid data to clients in a concise and timely manner.
  • Helping the project team forecasting resource demands and assuring that allocated resources to the project are in line with constant changes of project time-schedule.


Your profile & qualifications
As a person, you thrive from building strong relations, you are trustworthy, and able to exert influence when needed. With your great attention to detail and curious nature, you take a creative and innovative approach to problem solving and are eager to develop your existing knowledge and skills. You think logically, are willing to self-learn and can work in small teams. Moreover, a good sense of humour and a collaborative nature is always appreciated at Semco Maritime.

To succeed in this position, we imagine that you have:

  • Several years of experience from offshore EPC business, preferably from offshore wind industry/sub-station EPC
  • Several years of experience in using Primavera P6 software
  • Knowledge of other software: Excel, MS Project is a plus.
  • Great communication skills and fluency in English, verbal and written.
  • Preferably a technical educational background within construction, mechanical engineering, electrical engineering


Your place of work could either be at our HQ in Esbjerg or at one of our offices in Copenhagen, Aalborg or Gdynia. The position is full-time and will involve limited travelling to other Semco Maritime offices, sub-suppliers and customers.

Welcome to Semco Maritime

At Semco Maritime, we create change. For people. For projects. And for the global energy sector. With us, you will join a community of over 2,500 of the most dedicated thinkers and doers in the energy industry who are driving real change and making their own personal mark on the global energy landscape.

While everyone knows why the energy transition is vital, we are concerned with the journey. How to get there. By providing the answers needed to make change real. Because we believe that global energy ambitions can only be realized through hard work and clever pragmatic solutions. This is what we do. This is what we invite you to participate in.

So yes, working for us will change the energy sector – and may well change you too.

Care to join the movement?

Change. With us.

We conduct our interviews on an ongoing basis, so if you are interested, please submit your application as soon as possible via the link on the page.

Apply:
https://semcomaritime.career.emply.com/ad/senior-project-planner-for-offshore-wind-projects/djjv8y/en

If you have any questions, you are more than welcome to contact Flemming Breum, Senior Director, EPC Management at +45 2519 6962.

Semco Maritime is an international engineering and contracting company with 2,500 employees and 40 years of dedication rooted in both the conventional energy sector and the offshore wind industry. This puts us in a unique position to bridge today's and tomorrow’s solutions, constantly seeking clever and pragmatic ways to realise global energy ambitions. We do this through comprehensive project management across all phases of energy projects together with world-leading partners across the globe.

https://www.semcomaritime.com/
